channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Deputy + The General
channel.description:
# [color=lighblue]The Deputy (Blue Dragon Killer)[/color]
**Night Ability 1: Ambush** - 2 uses You will stand guard next to your door tonight, killing any visitors. *Note: Does not bypass death immunity.*
**Night Ability 2: Duty First** - Infinite uses You will guard your target and attack one random visitor. If they're attacked, you will attack the Killer first. _Note: You could end up killing Blue Dragon if this backfires._
# [color=purple]The General (Unseen Offensive)[/color]
**Night Ability 1: Militant** - 1 use Guard the Mastermind tonight, anybody that visits will be killed, you will also take your own life after. *Note: Does not bypass death immunity.*
**Day Ability 1: Showmanship** - 1 use You will trade your Class with the Assassin tonight. This ability cannot be used twice within the Unseen.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Deputy + The General
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
Eh. Well, if the FoL team approve, it’ll go into the FoL 9 RNG.

Made a slight change, Sheriff won’t recruit one anymore, it’ll appear as any other Class

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Deputy + The General
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
RIP

I’d love to see some of your BD Killer roles as I genuinely think the game would profit from having another one. All of the ideas posted on these forums are really cool, and most of them are balanced, but they don’t think of the game as a whole and what new roles are needed to benefit it.

Don’t wanna hurry you tho lol I’ll wait until you’re ready.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Deputy + The General
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
I actually have, I’ve got at least 3 more which I’m working on.

This was something that I wanted to get out fast mainly for FoL but it wasn’t fast enough it seems.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Deputy + The General
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
It’s a fun and balanced role but honestly I’ve never been in a game where BD has too much night-killing power and this seems to reduce it further (I know he can kill but not with the same ease as a Knight). I get you don’t want too many Knights in a game (cuz that’s just dumb tbh) and this is certainly one way to go about that.

Personally I just want another BD killing role to be added so Knight is not so heavily relied upon. Got any Killer roles on that folder of yours Plex?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Deputy + The General
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
I know this Class seems bland for a ToL Class but I really wanted to make something somewhat similar to the Knight but with a little extra kick.

For example:

Deputy
Instead of visiting to Kill, he’ll stay home and kill visitors.
Instead of guarding and killing/taking his life, he’ll stop killers from visiting his target.

General
Instead of guarding all unseen, he guards Mastermind and kills visitors.
And his second ability is just a kind of… odd. I wasn’t sure about it at all but I felt like with it being a rare occurrence situation, why not give it something super special?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Deputy + The General
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
This only helps if nobles were recruited earlier, to expand limit to 4. Otherwise, the mastermind will try to convert once you are an assassin, unless I read this wrong.

This made no sense. You read it very wrong.

Isn’t this essentially the physician’s heal, except it stops the visit (so observer can’t catch them) and does not cure nightshade poisoning?

No, it stops Killers from visiting whoever Deputy is guarding. Also, Observer still wouldn’t know the Killer’s real identity if somebody visits and the person doesn’t die. It would be more confusing in their results. Deputy can stop people from being Possessed, can stop Reaper from Reaping, can stop Knight from Cold Steeling a semi-confirmed BD, etc.

The sheriff can make a knight for two reasons: 1) he can be guarded by the knight (the deputy can also do this, so for this purpose, it is fine) and 2) cold steel, so sheriff can eliminate found unseen without outing himself. Deputy cannot kill, it seems

You obviously can’t read.

Night Ability 1: Ambush - 2 uses
You will stand guard next to your door tonight, killing any visitors.
Note: Does not bypass death immunity.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Deputy + The General
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

The Mastermind can convert jailed targets and anybody effected by visit blocking abilities

This only helps if nobles were recruited earlier, to expand limit to 4. Otherwise, the mastermind will try to convert once you are an assassin, unless I read this wrong.

ThePlex:

You will stand with whoever you target tonight, protecting them from killers.

Isn’t this essentially the physician’s heal, except it stops the visit (so observer can’t catch them) and does not cure nightshade poisoning?

ThePlex:

I added this idea because of the Sheriff’s ability to recruit a Knight.

The sheriff can make a knight for two reasons: 1) he can be guarded by the knight (the deputy can also do this, so for this purpose, it is fine) and 2) cold steel, so sheriff can eliminate found unseen without outing himself. Deputy cannot kill, it seems

Read full topic
